view.label: Smart Agent Hosts
view.definition:
{"visualizations":{"viz_DklNAYZ7":{"type":"viz.table","options":{},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_fLYjC67K"},"title":"Host Details"},"viz_n8Ra6L3X":{"type":"viz.singlevalue","options":{"trendDisplayMode":"percent"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_3u0Z77sR"},"title":"# Active Hosts"},"viz_0wq5sA0z":{"type":"viz.table","options":{"numberPrecision":4,"unit":"%"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_jCIYu8Qp"},"title":"Top CPU %"},"viz_1HnlUTtC":{"type":"viz.area","options":{"legend.placement":"bottom"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_Q5vU7ktS"},"title":"Total Network I/O"},"viz_zyLc5jFI":{"type":"viz.area","options":{"legend.placement":"bottom"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_PNY3ES6T"},"title":"Total Network Errors"},"viz_wC1GRb87":{"type":"viz.area","options":{},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_GLVHlkgb"},"title":"CPU Utilization"},"viz_b3hgGluX":{"type":"viz.area","options":{"axisY.maximumNumber":100},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_OJwhaSzx"},"title":"CPU %","description":"percentile utilization"},"viz_YuTjzfNI":{"type":"viz.area","options":{"legend.placement":"bottom"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_isU6sFia"},"title":"Total Disk Space"},"viz_nrtlrfVx":{"type":"viz.area","options":{"legend.placement":"bottom"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_0aoZlYdF"},"title":"Total Disk I/O Ops"},"viz_cuK7hUhG":{"type":"viz.table","options":{},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_zaJUFXLF"},"title":"Memory page swaps"},"viz_w6c0xxnw":{"type":"viz.area","options":{"legend.placement":"bottom"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_Wo8UsX0p"},"title":"Total Memory"},"viz_slI7MsDz":{"type":"viz.area","options":{"axisY.maximumNumber":100},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_GnFgQrrd"},"title":"Memory Used %","description":"percentile distribution"},"viz_hY6KSJOK":{"type":"viz.table","options":{},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_t2BZ9e2D_ds_zaJUFXLF"},"title":"Top Disk Used"},"viz_cFJLPGzS":{"type":"viz.table","options":{},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_U0C3dNgr_ds_t2BZ9e2D_ds_zaJUFXLF"},"title":"Top Network Activity"}},"dataSources":{"ds_fLYjC67K":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"$timerange.earliest$","latest":"$timerange.latest$"},"query":"| msearch index=sim_metrics | search sf_streamLabel="DSIM:Hosts (Smart Agent/collectd)" "metric_name:cpu.utilization" extracted_host IN ($host$) 
| fillnull value=" " host_mem_total host_linux_version host_cpu_cores 
| stats count by extracted_host host_mem_total host_linux_version host_cpu_cores | rename extracted_host as Host 
| eval memory=floor(host_mem_total/(1024*1024)) | rename host_linux_version as OS | rename host_cpu_cores as vCPU | table Host memory vCPU OS"},"name":"hosts_details"},"ds_3u0Z77sR":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"$timerange.earliest$","latest":"$timerange.latest$"},"query":"| mstats count("cpu.utilization") WHERE index=sim_metrics sf_streamLabel="DSIM:Hosts (Smart Agent/collectd)" by extracted_host span=5m
| timechart count(extracted_host) span=5m"},"name":"host_count"},"ds_jCIYu8Qp":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"$timerange.earliest$","latest":"$timerange.latest$"},"query":"| mstats avg(_value) as val WHERE index=sim_metrics metric_name="cpu.utilization" sf_streamLabel="DSIM:Hosts (Smart Agent/collectd)" extracted_host IN ($host$) BY extracted_host span=5m
| chart sparkline avg(val) as cpu.utilization BY extracted_host
| sort - cpu.utilization | head 10
| rename extracted_host as host
| table sparkline host cpu.utilization"},"name":"top cpu %"},"ds_Q5vU7ktS":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"$timerange.earliest$","latest":"$timerange.latest$"},"query":"| mstats sum("if_octets.tx") as transmitted sum("if_octets.rx") as received WHERE index=sim_metrics sf_streamLabel="DSIM:Hosts (Smart Agent/collectd)" extracted_host IN ($host$) span=5m"},"name":"Network I/O"},"ds_PNY3ES6T":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"$timerange.earliest$","latest":"$timerange.latest$"},"query":"| mstats sum("if_errors.rx") as errors_in sum("if_errors.tx") as errors_out WHERE index=sim_metrics sf_streamLabel="DSIM:Hosts (Smart Agent/collectd)" extracted_host IN ($host$) span=5m"},"name":"total_network_errors"},"ds_GLVHlkgb":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"$timerange.earliest$","latest":"$timerange.latest$"},"query":"| mstats avg("cpu.utilization") as cpu.utilization WHERE index=sim_metrics sf_streamLabel="DSIM:Hosts (Smart Agent/collectd)" extracted_host IN ($host$) span=5m"},"name":"cpu_utilization"},"ds_OJwhaSzx":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| mstats avg(_value) as mean max(_value) as max min(_value) as min perc10(_value) as p10 perc50(_value) as p50 perc90(_value) as p90 WHERE index=sim_metrics metric_name="cpu.utilization" sf_streamLabel="DSIM:Hosts (Smart Agent/collectd)" extracted_host IN ($host$) span=5m","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$timerange.earliest$","latest":"$timerange.latest$"}},"name":"cpu %"},"ds_isU6sFia":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"$timerange.earliest$","latest":"$timerange.latest$"},"query":"| mstats avg(df_complex.free) as df_complex.free avg(df_complex.used) as df_complex.used WHERE index=sim_metrics sf_streamLabel="DSIM:Hosts (Smart Agent/collectd)" extracted_host IN ($host$) span=5m
| eval df_complex.free='df_complex.free'/(1024*1024*1024)
| eval df_complex.used='df_complex.used'/(1024*1024*1024)"},"name":"disk space"},"ds_0aoZlYdF":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| mstats avg(disk_ops.write) as disk_ops.write avg(disk_ops.read) as disk_ops.read WHERE index=sim_metrics sf_streamLabel="DSIM:Hosts (Smart Agent/collectd)" extracted_host IN ($host$) span=10s","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$timerange.earliest$","latest":"$timerange.latest$"}},"name":"disk_io_ops"},"ds_zaJUFXLF":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"$timerange.earliest$","latest":"$timerange.latest$"},"query":"| mstats avg("vmpage_io.swap.in") as swap_in avg("vmpage_io.swap.out") as swap_out WHERE index=sim_metrics sf_streamLabel="DSIM:Hosts (Smart Agent/collectd)" extracted_host IN ($host$) by extracted_host span=5m
| eval swap=swap_in+swap_out
| chart sparkline avg(swap) as swap by extracted_host
| rename extracted_host as host
| table sparkline host swap"},"name":"mem_page_swaps"},"ds_Wo8UsX0p":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"$timerange.earliest$","latest":"$timerange.latest$"},"query":"| mstats sum(memory.free) as memory.free sum(memory.used) as memory.used sum(memory.buffered) as memory.buffered sum(memory.cached) as memory.cached WHERE index=sim_metrics sf_streamLabel="DSIM:Hosts (Smart Agent/collectd)" extracted_host IN ($host$) span=5m 
| eval memory.free='memory.free'/(1024*1024*1024)
| eval memory.used='memory.used'/(1024*1024*1024) 
| eval memory.cached='memory.cached'/(1024*1024*1024)
| eval memory.buffered='memory.buffered'/(1024*1024*1024)"},"name":"total_memory"},"ds_GnFgQrrd":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"$timerange.earliest$","latest":"$timerange.latest$"},"query":"| mstats avg(_value) as mean max(_value) as max min(_value) as min perc10(_value) as p10 perc50(_value) as p50 perc90(_value) as p90 WHERE index=sim_metrics metric_name="memory.utilization" sf_streamLabel="DSIM:Hosts (Smart Agent/collectd)" extracted_host IN ($host$) span=5m"},"name":"percentile_memory_distribution"},"ds_YnPmPXRC":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"},"query":"| mstats avg(cpu.utilization) where index=sim_metrics sf_streamLabel="DSIM:Hosts (Smart Agent/collectd)" by extracted_host 
| table extracted_host"},"name":"host_list"},"ds_t2BZ9e2D_ds_zaJUFXLF":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"$timerange.earliest$","latest":"$timerange.latest$"},"query":"| mstats avg(df_complex.used) as df_complex.used WHERE index=sim_metrics sf_streamLabel="DSIM:Hosts (Smart Agent/collectd)" extracted_host IN ($host$) by extracted_host span=5m
| eval df_complex.used='df_complex.used'/(1024*1024*1024)
| chart sparkline avg(df_complex.used) as disk.used by extracted_host
| sort - disk.used
| table sparkline extracted_host disk.used"},"name":"top disk used"},"ds_U0C3dNgr_ds_t2BZ9e2D_ds_zaJUFXLF":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"$timerange.earliest$","latest":"$timerange.latest$"},"query":"| mstats sum("if_octets.tx") as transmitted sum("if_octets.rx") as received WHERE index=sim_metrics sf_streamLabel="DSIM:Hosts (Smart Agent/collectd)" extracted_host IN ($host$) span=5m by extracted_host
| eval net_stat= transmitted+received
| chart sparkline avg(net_stat) as network_io by extracted_host
| sort - network_io
| table sparkline extracted_host network_io"},"name":"top disk used"}},"inputs":{"host_input":{"type":"input.multiselect","title":"Host(s)","options":{"items":[{"label":"All","value":"*"}],"token":"host","defaultValue":"*"},"encoding":{"label":"primary[0]","value":"primary[0]"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_YnPmPXRC"},"tokenTransform":{"prefix":"start ","valuePrefix":"instance_id=","valueSuffix":" ","suffix":" end","delimeter":" OR "}},"time_input":{"options":{"defaultValue":"-4h,now","token":"timerange"},"type":"input.timerange","title":"Time Range"}},"layout":{"globalInputs":["host_input","time_input"],"type":"absolute","options":{"height":1350,"width":1300,"display":"auto-scale"},"structure":[{"item":"viz_DklNAYZ7","type":"block","position":{"x":250,"y":10,"w":1040,"h":260}},{"item":"viz_n8Ra6L3X","type":"block","position":{"x":10,"y":10,"w":230,"h":260}},{"item":"viz_0wq5sA0z","type":"block","position":{"x":800,"y":280,"w":490,"h":250}},{"item":"viz_1HnlUTtC","type":"block","position":{"x":10,"y":1050,"w":390,"h":260}},{"item":"viz_zyLc5jFI","type":"block","position":{"x":410,"y":1050,"w":380,"h":260}},{"item":"viz_wC1GRb87","type":"block","position":{"x":10,"y":280,"w":390,"h":250}},{"item":"viz_b3hgGluX","type":"block","position":{"x":410,"y":280,"w":380,"h":250}},{"item":"viz_YuTjzfNI","type":"block","position":{"x":10,"y":810,"w":390,"h":230}},{"item":"viz_nrtlrfVx","type":"block","position":{"x":410,"y":810,"w":380,"h":230}},{"item":"viz_cuK7hUhG","type":"block","position":{"x":800,"y":540,"w":490,"h":260}},{"item":"viz_w6c0xxnw","type":"block","position":{"x":10,"y":540,"w":390,"h":260}},{"item":"viz_slI7MsDz","type":"block","position":{"x":410,"y":540,"w":380,"h":260}},{"item":"viz_hY6KSJOK","type":"block","position":{"x":800,"y":810,"w":490,"h":230}},{"item":"viz_cFJLPGzS","type":"block","position":{"x":800,"y":1050,"w":490,"h":260}}]},"description":"","title":"Smart Agent Hosts"}
